group_1.textRight: Now that we've come this far,@we should be alright.
For now, I'm relieved your companions@are safe.
We keep the town gates closed in case@of a night attack.
We'll be entering through the back.
We usually keep it hidden so it can't be found.
Come on, let's hurry.@Dolma must be worried sick right now.
I need a good excuse…

group_1.textLeft: ...Should we avoid saying anything about@the Rakshasi having sparked the war?

group_1.textRight: Well…there are some things we're not supposed@to know, yes?
Complete hatred makes people believe@they are right.
…And that's fine.
We're all going to die soon anyway.
What are you acting so surprised for?@Our enemy is an empire... Victory is impossible.
Yes…no matter what we do, there's no point@in fighting or hatred…
So it's best to focus on enjoying the days@we have left.
We'll spend all our days together here@at the nunnery until the very, very end...
That's right, we'll drink butter tea together…@[chara:105101:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:105101:eyeClose_1][chara:105101:lipSynch_1]*Giggle* Yes, that's comfort right there…
…But there is one person I'd like to exempt.
Rabi… When the Mongolian Army comes,@please take Dolma and run away.

group_1.textLeft: What are you going to do?

group_1.textRight: Me…? What am I…?
Ahh, no, I haven't really given it much thought…
Well, people are expecting me to fight,@so I suppose I will.
…It's obvious how this will all turn out, but I gave@them hope, so I must take responsibility.

group_1.textLeft: Surely there's a way we can all escape.

group_1.textRight: No, there's no way... If we manage that,@they'll keep coming after us.
But if it's only a few of us… [chara:105101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:105101:eyeClose_1][chara:105101:lipSynch_1]Ah, no, no—@That's not an option.

group_1.textLeft: …Even so, I think you should be the one@to help her escape.
Don't leave it all up to me.

group_1.textRight: …Why not?

group_1.textLeft: It's hard to sneak behind enemy lines,@and yet you make it look so easy.
There's something special about you,@just as Dolma said…

group_1.textRight: No, that isn't so.
If anything, you're the one who's special,@aren't you, Rabi?
I know you have the power of the Buddha.
I don't have anything like that.
When my hometown was pillaged by the@Mongols, all I could do was run away.
I truly have nothing…and I won't be able@to keep Dolma safe as I am anymore…
So that's why I need you to protect her@from now on instead of me.
Yes. I need someone special to save Dolma@when I can't.
And since you're a Rakshasi,@I can leave that to you…

group_1.textLeft: And you're trying to save her in turn…
…So I'm certain that you two can help protect@each other.

group_1.textRight: There's no way we can do that against@the Mongols.
…I know the reality of the situation.

group_1.textCenter: …They have a secret entrance in the back.

group_1.textLeft: …Yes, it seems they took the bait.

group_1.textRight: Right, it should be much easier@to breach the town like this.

group_1.textLeft: This should keep suffering to a minimum.

group_1.textRight: Speaking of which...those two spies@we set free...

group_1.textLeft: …All Rakshasis will suffer the same.@That I can tell you.
